[Question] How did the AI solve the limitation of the Williamson ether synthesis reaction?
[Answer]
answer: The AI discovered a revolutionary synthesis route using a phosphorus-based catalyst, achieving an addition rate of over 99.5% and high molecular weight.
pred: The AI identified a novel synthesis route utilizing a phosphorus-based catalyst, which solved the limitation of the Williamson ether synthesis reaction. The conventional Williamson ether synthesis reaction produces only oligomers, diols and terpenoids, which are then further processed to yield polymers.
